content: /*<![CDATA[*/ $('#title').html($('meta[name=map-description]').attr('content')); /*]]>*/ Exporting user directories You can export valid recipients, groups and email aliases to a comma-separated values (CSV) file. Procedure Choose to export valid recipients, groups or email aliases and do the following: Select a domain from the Valid recipients drop-down list and click Export to CSV. Select a group from the Groups drop-down list and click Export to CSV. Next to Email aliases, click Export to CSV. Note In the exported file, the primary email alias displays at the beginning of each line. Â© 2025 Trend Micro Incorporated. All rights reserved.Search Knowledge Base
